definition: any of several small graceful hawks of the family Accipitridae having long pointed wings and feeding on insects and small animals, to fly a kite
details:
noun
- any of several small graceful hawks of the family Accipitridae having long pointed wings and feeding on insects and small animals
- a plaything consisting of a light frame covered with tissue paper
= example: a plaything consisting of a light frame covered with tissue paper
- a bank check drawn on insufficient funds at another bank in order to take advantage of the float
- a bank check that has been fraudulently altered to increase its face value
verb
- to fly a kite
= example: to fly a kite
- to soar or fly like a kite
= example: to soar or fly like a kite
- to get credit or money by using a bad check
= example: to get credit or money by using a bad check
- to increase the amount of a check fraudulently
= example: to increase the amount of a check fraudulently
